author: hbakhshi
body:
#### PR description:

Here is the accepted PR in the master branch:
#35547

#### PR validation:



#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

we need the [AJJGenJetFilter](https://github.com/hbakhshi/cmssw/blob/AJJGenJetFilter11X/GeneratorInterface/GenFilters/plugins/AJJGenJetFilter.cc) filter to produce some samples for the snowmass studies. the snowmass campaign is based on cmssw_11_0_x
title: AJJGenJetFilter to filter photon+2jets events at GenLevel
